steps.title: Initial Inquiry
steps.description: Potential client contacts the company expressing interest in their services

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: Company schedules a consultation meeting with the client to discuss their needs

steps.title: Proposal Submission
steps.description: Company prepares and submits a proposal outlining the scope of work and cost

steps.title: Negotiation and Agreement
steps.description: Client and company negotiate terms and reach an agreement to move forward

steps.title: Preparation
steps.description: Company prepares the necessary equipment and props for the photo shoot

steps.title: On-site Shoot
steps.description: Photographer visits the location and conducts the photo shoot according to the client's requirements

steps.title: Editing and Post-production
steps.description: Company processes and enhances the captured photos to meet the desired quality

steps.title: Delivery of Final Photos
steps.description: Company delivers the edited and finalized photos to the client

steps.title: Follow-up Communication
steps.description: Company reaches out to clients after the completion of a project to ensure satisfaction

steps.title: Offer Additional Services
steps.description: Company identifies opportunities to provide additional services or products to the client

steps.title: Maintain Regular Contact
steps.description: Company maintains regular contact with clients through newsletters, updates, or personalized messages

steps.title: Referral Program
steps.description: Company encourages satisfied clients to refer their contacts and provides incentives for referrals
